column1: Little Goat Diner////I have had paraths burrito
column2: spanish omlette and dark chocolate chip crunch pancakes and all of the them taste amazing. The egg in the paraths burrito is always perfectly cooked
column3: the salad and the sauce to go with it taste amazing. Its just the perfect texture with the creamy sunny side up egg
column5: little bit of paratha with a bite and the tangy sauce... perfect bite! The spanish omlette was amazing too
column6: and the chocolate chip pancakes - very rich
column8: pancakes just sweet to contrast the dark chocolate and those little chocolate pearls add some crunch to the bite.
